results.description: Results and scorecards from Sri Lanka's three-match Twenty20 series in Australia.
results.title: Sri Lanka in Australia 2019

thumbnail.altText: Australia with the T20 series trophy

results.description: County champions Essex will play the MCC at Galle in Sri Lanka in the domestic season's traditional curtain-raiser in March.
results.shortTitle: Champions Essex to play MCC in Sri Lanka
results.title: Champion County match: Essex to play MCC in Sri Lanka in March

results.description: Australia host Sri Lanka in the second T20 international at the Gabba - listen to live commentary from ABC Grandstand on BBC 5 Live Sports Extra.
results.shortTitle: Listen: Australia v Sri Lanka - second T20
results.title: Listen: Australia host Sri Lanka in second T20 international

results.description: David Warner hits his maiden Twenty20 international century on his 33rd birthday as Australia demolish Sri Lanka by 134 runs.
results.shortTitle: Warner hundred leads to huge Aussie win
results.title: Australia v Sri Lanka: David Warner scores 100 not out in 134-run T20 victory

results.description: Listen to live ball-by-ball commentary of Australia v Sri Lanka in their first T20 at the Adelaide Oval.
results.title: Listen to Australia v Sri Lanka in an international T20

thumbnail.altText: Aaron Finch in action for Australia

results.description: England will travel to Sri Lanka for a two-Test series in March 2020 as part of the ICC World Test Championship.
results.shortTitle: England set for two-Test Sri Lanka tour
results.title: England in Sri Lanka: Tourists set for two-Test series in March

results.description: Results and scorecards from Sri Lanka's limited-overs tour of Pakistan, featuring three ODIs and three Twenty20 internationals.
results.title: Sri Lanka in Pakistan 2019

thumbnail.altText: Sri Lanka's Danushka Gunathilaka and Pakistan's Babar Azam

results.description: Sri Lanka spinner Akila Dananjaya is banned from bowling in internationals for 12 months because of an illegal action - but their tour of Pakistan will go ahead.
results.title: Akila Dananjaya: Sri Lanka spinner suspended for illegal action

thumbnail.altText: Akila Dananjaya bowling for Sri Lanka

results.description: Ten Sri Lanka players, including captain Dimuth Karunaratne, opt out of their tour of Pakistan over security concerns.
results.shortTitle: Sri Lanka players shun Pakistan tour
results.title: Ten Sri Lanka players opt out of tour of Pakistan due to security concerns

results.description: Sri Lanka bowler Lasith Malinga takes four wickets in four balls for a second time in a Twenty20 win against New Zealand in Kandy.
results.shortTitle: Malinga takes four wickets in four balls
results.title: Lasith Malinga: Sri Lanka bowler takes four wickets in four balls for second time

results.description: Sri Lanka's Shehan Jayasuriya collides with Kusal Mendis, resulting in a six, which effectively settled the match and the series in New Zealand's favour.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Fielder collision results in crucial six for New Zealand
results.title: Sri Lankan fielder collision results in crucial six for New Zealand

results.description: After winning fans during the World Cup, New Zealand captain Kane Williamson is enjoying his birthday in style in Sri Lanka.
results.shortTitle: Sri Lanka fans give Williamson birthday cake
results.title: Kane Williamson: New Zealand captain gets birthday cake from Sri Lanka fans

results.description: Rumesh Ratnayake is named Sri Lanka interim coach for their home Test series against New Zealand, putting the future of head coach Chandika Hathurusingha in doubt.
results.shortTitle: Ratnayake named interim Sri Lanka coach
results.title: Rumesh Ratnayake named Sri Lanka's interim coach for New Zealand series

results.description: Results and scorecards from New Zealand's tour of Sri Lanka, featuring two Tests and three Twenty20 internationals.
results.title: New Zealand in Sri Lanka 2019

thumbnail.altText: Captains Dimuth Karunaratne and Kane Williamson with the Test trophy after the drawn series

results.description: Results and scorecards from Bangladesh's three-match ODI series in Sri Lanka - for whom Lasith Malinga makes his final one-day international appearance.
results.title: Bangladesh in Sri Lanka 2019

thumbnail.altText: Sri Lanka's Lasith Malinga is honoured before his final ODI

results.description: Sri Lanka's Lasith Malinga takes 3-38, including the last wicket of the match, in his final one-day international as the hosts beat Bangladesh by 91 runs in Colombo.
results.shortTitle: Malinga seals Sri Lanka win in final ODI
results.title: Sri Lanka v Bangladesh: Lasith Malinga takes 3-38 in final ODI

results.description: From Rihanna's cameo to Carlos Brathwaite's near heroics and Ben Stokes' acrobatics, we look at the highlights and lowlights of the World Cup group stage.
results.shortTitle: Rihanna, Kohli & Stokes - best (and worst) of World Cup group stage
results.title: Cricket World Cup: Kohli, Shakib and Rihanna - best of the group stage

thumbnail.altText: Rihanna and Kohli images from World Cup

results.description: Plot your team's progress to the final - full results for the World Cup in England and Wales.
results.title: Cricket World Cup: Results

results.description: Rohit Sharma strikes a record fifth century in a single World Cup as India beat Sri Lanka by seven wickets to finish top of the table.
results.shortTitle: Rohit hits fifth ton as India finish top
results.title: Cricket World Cup: Rohit Sharma hits fifth century as India beat Sri Lanka

thumbnail.altText: India's Rohit Sharma celebrates reaching his century

results.description: Rohit Sharma becomes the first man to score five centuries in a single World Cup as India beat Sri Lanka by seven wickets at Headingley.
results.shortTitle: Highlights: Rohit hits century as India beat Sri Lanka
results.title: Cricket World Cup: Rohit Sharma hits fifth century as India beat Sri Lanka
